title: Yi broken hybridization of damage types.
body:
300 True damage, 300 Physical damage, 200 magic damage.

% HP damage, magic damage and physical damage.

Might get GA and be completely useless since it's a trash tier item in most games on anyone but an ADC or occasionally Irelia right now and completely waste my stats while he just instagibs my team regardless.

Wouldn't be a problem if he wasnt innately stupidly tank for his kit and didn't have a slew of tanking options.

Counter itemisation aside from GA is non-existant and GA is trash.

No Tank item is useful, it's actually counterproductive. Warmogs - out of combat heal (useful /sarcasm and he has %HP dmg) Deadman's - slow and he has anti-slow plus HP which he % dmgs and armor which he ignores with his true damage (Seen it before, armor is basically useless).

Thorn - ignored (and it was nerfed to crap) the return damage is 100% useless.

GA - only option - trash tier item. (This item is overpriced, extremely situational and even then he ignores the armor and the passive is rarely useful unless all 5 people have it) plus that stats are bad.

Frozen heart: situational and the slow is pathetic in most cases. Randuins - the slow is ignored by his ultimate (plus the attack speed slow since its a debuff not an aura) and the reduced crit dmg is useless plus the armor is ignored and the HP gives him more %dmg).

Sunfire: barely useful.
